subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: With 14 strikeouts each, Sandy Koufax in 1965 and Matt Cain on Wednesday night distanced themselves from other pitchers of perfect games because they took care of more of the outs themselves.
snippet: With 14 strikeouts each, Sandy Koufax in 1965 and Matt Cain on Wednesday night distanced themselves from other pitchers of perfect games because they took care of more of the outs themselves.
